name: Custom Address Stamp
description:
Is this stylish, or what? Forget the printed label.

This lovely Calligraphy stamp is a miniature piece of art - completely hand lettered script is scanned, then made into a foam backed rubber stamp, mounted on a beautiful maple block.

Ideal uses include return address for your wedding invitations, announcements and everyday mailings from your home or business. 

Lettering style is our exclusive, "Loopy Luxe" Calligraphy. 

Perfect medium size for a return address at 1 1/2" x 3".

Simply purchase this listing and note your name(s) and address EXACTLY as it should be written in your order. Available with, or without handle. If preference is not noted, the handle will automatically be added.

Allow 2-4 weeks for delivery, or inquire about a rush order.

name: Save the Date Wedding Map
description:
A chic save-the-date map will have your guests a-buzz with excitement before your special day!

This listing is for a custom created map in digital format, that also includes the hand-lettering for your save the date. The style is line drawn, and is perfect for letterpress printing, as pictured.

Before we get started, we'll begin by having an phone or email conversation about your personal style and what locations and illustrations you wish to incorporate in your map. 

Printing costs is additional, and will vary on your choice for printing. You have the choice to request letterpress printing from us, or to have the print-ready file e-mailed directly to your printing source. 

Feel free to inquire with your questions prior to purchase.

name: Watercolored Wedding Map
description:
A gorgeously watercolored map, completely customized to reflect your style.

Before we get started, we'll begin by having an phone or email conversation about your personal style and what locations and illustrations you wish to incorporate in your map. 

You will receive the original map, either 9x9"square, or a 9x12" rectangle, as well as a high resolution scan.

Printing costs are additional, and will vary on your choice for printing. You have the choice to request printing from us, or to have the print-ready file e-mailed directly to your printing source. 

Please inquire with any questions at all, as well as to view additional map images.
